Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a red pottery vessel, exterior covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip, with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents as from Sehetepaten.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 19
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393154) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393154)
